cause.description:
Hillary Clinton at first gave me cold feet, but you have to look at her stance on the issues, you also have to look at the one thing that no other candidate can claim. She has the greatest economic leader of the last 50 years as her husband and advisor. She is our best hope in the next 4-8 years.
1. Strengthening the Middle Class
2. Energy Independence and Slower Global Warming
3. Providing Affordable and Accessable Heath Care
4. And Many many more....
cause.mission: Assist and Fundraise for the upcomming Campaign
cause.name: Hillary Clinton 2008
